title: 107. Allowing Happiness & Getting into Receiving Mode
description:
Happy Thursday!

In this episode we talk all things holding onto the frequency of happiness- not having it be fleeting or here today, gone tomorrow, but present as our home base frequency. The frequency we feel SAFE enough to return to. We also talk feeling worthy enough to receive + all about this total solar eclipse in Gemini at the north node.

Click here to enroll in my 4 month group coaching program The Embodied Womxn or visit Beatricekamau.com/embodiedwomxn

Business Inquiries?
Email the team: hi@beatricekamau.com
IG: @theselflovefix.

Website: www.beatricekamau.com
